API_Description: Represents the date and time when the document was created.
API_Description_Reason: The name 'CreationDate' suggests it stores the date and time of the document's creation.
Returns: A string representing the creation date and time of the document.
Returns_Reason: The parameter type is specified as 'string', indicating the return value is a string format of the date and time.

type.description: The format of the creation date string.
type.description_reason: The parameter 'type' likely specifies the format in which the creation date is returned, such as ISO 8601 or another date-time format.
type.type_reason: The parameter is explicitly defined as a string, indicating it specifies a format or type of the date representation.
